mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM system_user WHERE username = #{username})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO system_user (username, password_hash, full_name, email, phone, organization_id, is_admin, is_active, last_login_time, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{fullName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{organization.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isAdmin}, #{isActive}, #{lastLoginTime}, NOW(), NOW())
